attributes.action: build a hostel to enclose all MP's while in London with a one bedroom apartment each with phone and laptop then they need only claim for transport expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: End these vermin from telling the rest of the country to show restraint while they milk the system

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
